short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to monitor Ads and gather intelligence on your competition ads. Used by 1000s of marketers globally.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension collects data on the ads you see in your feed. It then analyzes this data to uncover valuable insights, helping you gain a clearer understanding of your ad campaigns. With these insights, you can optimize your campaigns and perform competitive analysis to maintain an edge over your competitors.
